name: diskIOTable
description: Table of IO devices and how much data they have read/written.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.1.name: diskIOIndex
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.1.description: Reference index for each observed device.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.2.name: diskIODevice
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.2.description: The name of the device we are counting/checking.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.3.name: diskIONRead
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.3.description: The number of bytes read from this device since boot.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.4.name: diskIONWritten
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.4.description: The number of bytes written to this device since boot.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.5.name: diskIOReads
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.5.description: The number of read accesses from this device since boot.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.6.name: diskIOWrites
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.6.description: The number of write accesses to this device since boot.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.9.name: diskIOLA1
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.9.description: The 1 minute average load of disk (%)

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.10.name: diskIOLA5
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.10.description: The 5 minute average load of disk (%)

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.11.name: diskIOLA15
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.11.description: The 15 minute average load of disk (%)

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.12.name: diskIONReadX
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.12.description: The number of bytes read from this device since boot.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.13.name: diskIONWrittenX
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.13.description: The number of bytes written to this device since boot.

.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.14.name: diskIOBusyTime
.1.3.6.1.4.1.2021.13.15.1.1.14.description: The number of usecs the drive has been busy since boot.
